name: Fruit Block - Puzzle Legend
description:
Fruit Block is a funny and juicy match-3 game.

Fruit Block is a new play game with impressive game screen and effects.

Welcome to the juicy fruit world! Start your journey with other players!

By the way, Fruit Block is very popular with beautiful ladies!

[HOW TO PLAY]
- Tap more than 2 of the same fruits to blast them!
- Tap more than 5 of the same fruits to generate special fruits: rocket, bomb or rainbow!

[WHAT YOU CAN DO]
- Rescue the animals.
- Achieve different goals with different ways.
- Get free booster and use it at critical moment.
- Blast different special fruits which are designed very interesting.

[GAME FEATURES]
- Perfect gaming experience.
- Easy and completely free game.
- Very friendly to ladies.
- Play game anytime anywhere even there is no internet.
- 1600+ levels.
- Juicy and colorful game world.
